items.content_html:
Your Novel Title


A living, breathing sci-fi universe — logs, transmissions, and world-building entries released as they’re written.

Enter the Archive
LOG 001

First Contact Protocol

Stardate 1247.3

The initial transmission from Europa Station was garbled, but one thing was clear: we are no longer alone…

Read transmission
LOG 002

Artifact Recovery

Stardate 1249.1

Diving team retrieved a perfectly smooth obsidian shard from the trench. It’s warm to the touch and humming at 432 Hz…

Continue reading
CHAPTER 01

The Long Night Begins

Published 07 Dec 2025

Captain Elara Voss stared at the dying star through the viewport, knowing this would be humanity’s final leap…

Begin chapter

items.title: Input
items.summary: Openstax Library of Openly-licensed, Peer-reviewed educational material for higher education such as Economics to Calculus to Python Programming. In fact while attending community college I used openstax for both Calculus 2 and 3. Visit Openstax → Massive collection of open textbooks. Especially if you are…
items.content_html:
Openstax

Library of Openly-licensed, Peer-reviewed educational material for higher education such as Economics to Calculus to Python Programming. In fact while attending community college I used openstax for both Calculus 2 and 3.

 

Visit Openstax →

Libretexts

Massive collection of open textbooks. Especially if you are interested in STEM related fields like Engineering and Biology.

 

Visit LibreTexts commons →

Merlot

Another open-licensed peer-reviewed library of resources with an emphasis on higher education and multimedia materials.

 

Visit MERLOT →

MIT OpenCourseWare

Complete course materials from almost every MIT course since 2002. You find find courses on the arts and theatre to aerospace and quantum mechanics.

 

Visit MIT OpenCourseWare →

OER Commons

Huge searchable hub with materials from kindergarten through higher education and workforce training.

 

Visit OER commons →

Khan Academy

Can't forget about good ole' Khan Academy. K–12 and some college topics (especially math, science, test prep). They even have cirriculum up to linear algebra, multivariable calculus, and differential equation assistance as well!

 

Visit Khan Academy →

freeCodeCamp

Comprehensive coding curriculum with certifications - completely free

Visit freeCodeCamp →

 

Public Launch

Officially live! The product is now available worldwide.

 

 

MDN Web Docs

Best resource for web development documentation and tutorials

Visit MDN →
 

The Odin Project

Full-stack curriculum with projects to build your portfolio

Visit The Odin Project →

items.summary: Project Started Kicked off the new initiative with the core team in Oslo. Completed the design system and shared it with stakeholders. Launched internal beta – early feedback has been excellent. Officially live! The product is now available worldwide.
items.content_html:
Project Started

Kicked off the new initiative with the core team in Oslo.

First Milestone

Completed the design system and shared it with stakeholders.

Beta Release

Launched internal beta – early feedback has been excellent.

Public Launch

Officially live! The product is now available worldwide.

items.title: Gradient Podcast Template
items.summary: Listen to this Week's Podcast [Insert Episode] For its third iteration of the Las Vegas Grand Prix twenty of the best drivers took to the streets of Sin City. With the longest track on the calendar, with some of the lowest grip of the season…
items.content_html:
Listen to this Week's Podcast

[Insert Episode]

For its third iteration of the Las Vegas Grand Prix twenty of the best drivers took to the streets of Sin City. With the longest track on the calendar, with some of the lowest grip of the season on a cold night in the desert with the appearance of rain sprinkled throughout as spectators we were treated with quite the show on the Las Vegas strip. Max claiming his 69th victory of his career on a weekend where McLaren dropped the ball mechanically causing a double DNF for the team has now opened the door for Max Verstappen to potentially take the title fight to all the way to Abu Dhabi. A good haul of points for Mercedes with a spectatular drive from Kimi Andrea Antonelli on 53 lap hard tires to claim P3 from P16 has soundly solidified Mercedes as P2 in the constructors by a good margin.

The Highlights

Project Started

Kicked off the new initiative with the core team in Oslo.

First Milestone

Completed the design system and shared it with stakeholders.

Beta Release

Launched internal beta – early feedback has been excellent.

Public Launch

Officially live! The product is now available worldwide.
